verses.verse: And it came to <S%H4428>pass<s%>, when the king <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had given him <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all his <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>,

And <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H6213>do<s%> all that is in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>; for Jehovah is with <S%H3068>thee<s%>.
And it came to pass the same <S%H3915>night<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Go <S%H3212><s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Shalt thou <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%> for me to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>?

for I have not <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, even to this <S%H3117>day<s%>, but have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in a <S%H168>tent<s%> and in a <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

In all places wherein I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H1696>spake<s%> I a <S%H1697>word<s%> with <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Why have ye not <S%H1129>built<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>?

Now therefore thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, I <S%H3947>took<s%> thee from the <S%H5116>sheepcote<s%>, from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, that thou shouldest be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%>, over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

and I have been with thee whithersoever thou <S%H1980>wentest<s%>, and have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> from before <S%H6440>thee<s%>; and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> thee a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, like unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> ones that are in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and will <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H7931>them<s%>, that they may dwell in their own <S%H7264>place<s%>, and be moved no <S%H1121>more<s%>; neither shall the children of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them any <S%H3254>more<s%>, as at the <S%H7223>first<s%>,

and as from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and I will cause thee to <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>. Moreover <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5046>telleth<s%> thee that Jehovah will <S%H6213>make<s%> thee a <S%H1004>house<s%>.

When thy <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3318>thee<s%>, that shall proceed out of thy <S%H4578>bowels<s%>, and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>.
He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>, and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

I will be his <S%H1>father<s%>, and he shall be my <S%H1121>son<s%>: if he commit <S%H5753>iniquity<s%>, I will <S%H3198>chasten<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%>, and with the <S%H5061>stripes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>;
but my <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> shall not depart <S%H5493>from<s%> <S%H5493>him<s%>, as I took it from <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, whom I put <S%H5493>away<s%> before <S%H6440>thee<s%>.

And thy <S%H1004>house<s%> and thy <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H539>made<s%> sure <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3678>thee<s%>: thy throne shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
According to all these <S%H1697>words<s%>, and according to all this <S%H2384>vision<s%>, so did <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3427>in<s%>, and sat <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Who am <S%H136>I<s%>, O Lord <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, and what is my <S%H1004>house<s%>, that thou hast <S%H935>brought<s%> me thus <S%H1988>far<s%>?

And this was yet a small <S%H6994>thing<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>; but thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> also of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> for a great while to <S%H7350>come<s%>; and this too after the <S%H8452>manner<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>!
And what <S%H3254>can<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> unto <S%H3045>thee<s%>? for thou knowest thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
For thy <S%H1697>word<s%>'s <S%H3820>sake<s%>, and according to thine own heart, hast thou <S%H6213>wrought<s%> all this <S%H1420>greatness<s%>, to make thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> know <S%H3045>it<s%>.

Wherefore thou art <S%H1431>great<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>: for there is none like <S%H430>thee<s%>, neither is there any God <S%H2108>besides<s%> <S%H8085>thee<s%>, according to all that we have heard with our <S%H241>ears<s%>.

And what <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> is like thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, even like <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6299>redeem<s%> unto himself for a <S%H5971>people<s%>, and to <S%H7760>make<s%> him a <S%H8034>name<s%>, and to <S%H6213>do<s%> great <S%H1420>things<s%> for <S%H3372>you<s%>, and terrible things for thy <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, whom thou <S%H6299>redeemest<s%> to thee out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and their <S%H430>gods<s%>?

And thou didst <S%H3559>establish<s%> to thyself thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to be a <S%H5971>people<s%> unto thee <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>; and <S%H3068>thou<s%>, Jehovah, <S%H1961>becamest<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H3068>now<s%>, O Jehovah <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H1697>word<s%> that thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and concerning his <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H6965>confirm<s%> thou it <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> as thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

And let thy <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> before <S%H6440>thee<s%>.

For <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, hast <S%H1540>revealed<s%> to thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I will <S%H1129>build<s%> thee a <S%H1004>house<s%>: therefore hath thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6419>pray<s%> this prayer unto <S%H8605>thee<s%>.

And <S%H136>now<s%>, O Lord <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, thou art <S%H430>God<s%>, and thy <S%H1697>words<s%> are <S%H571>truth<s%>, and thou hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> this <S%H2896>good<s%> thing unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>:

now therefore let it <S%H2974>please<s%> thee to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that it may continue for <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H136>thee<s%>; for thou, O Lord <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H1293>it<s%>: and with thy blessing let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
